name: 胡憲倫
objective:
本課程主要在於介紹產品環保化設計的概念與實務做法，將會詳細介紹生命週期評估的內涵與原理做法，並將透過軟體的實際作來學期如何從事產品的生命週期評估。簡化式的生命週期評估之作法也會在課堂中被介紹。
To understand how Life Cycle Thinking and Life Cycle Management can solve environmental problems. Life Cycle Assessment (LCA), one of the most important tools for analyzing and assessing environmental problems, will be taught during the course of the semester. Students will also be learning a popular LCA software, SimaPro. Various applications related to LCA, such as carbon footprinting, carbon labeling, and eco-design, will also be practiced in the class.
schedule:
Week 1	Introduction of Life Cycle Assessment I: History, Development, and Applications
Week 2	Introduction of Life Cycle Assessment II: Life Cycle Thinking and Life Cycle Management
Week 3	Methodology of LCA: I. Goal and Scope Definition and inventory analysis
Week 4 	Methodology of LCA- II. Inventory analysis
Week 5	National Holiday (no class)
Week 6	LCA Software SimaPro: Introduction and Practices (Make learning groups)
Week 7	Methodology of LCA- III. Methodology of LCIA
Week 8	Methodology of LCA- IV. Uncertainty, sensitivity analysis, and interpretation
Week 9	Mid-term Exam
Week 10	Group report- LCA for one product or service 
Week 11	LCA Applications(I): Product and Process Ecodesign; Environmental Declarations and Carbon Labeling, etc.
Week 12	LCA Applications(II): Environmental Engineering Related Applications
Week 13	Other Types of LCA (Eco-efficiency, MFCA, Social LCA, and Organizational LCA, etc.)
Week 14	Special Topic: CBAM and Carbon Footprint, Water Footprint, and Environmental Footprint
Week 15	LCA Outlook and Latest Development: Net Zero and Biodiversity; Natural Capital Accounting
Week 16  Team Project Presentation I.
Week 17  Team Project Presentation II.
Week 18  Final Exam
